00016 UITextViewWidget::UITextViewWidget(boost::shared_ptr<const TranslationManager> translation_manager,
00017                                    boost::shared_ptr<StarredVersesModel> starred_verses_model,
00018                                    QWidget* parent) :
00019     QWidget(parent),
00020     m_translation_manager(translation_manager),
00021     m_starred_verses_model(starred_verses_model),
00022     m_displayed_verse(new VerseDisplay("", -1, -1)),
00023     m_title(new QLabel()),
00024     m_text(new QTextEdit()),
00025     m_more_button(new QToolButton()),
00026     m_less_button(new QToolButton()),
00027     m_star_button(new QToolButton()),
00028     m_prev_button(new QToolButton()),
00029     m_next_button(new QToolButton())
00030 {
00031     QT_CONNECT(m_more_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(increase_displayed_context()));
00032     QT_CONNECT(m_less_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(decrease_displayed_context()));
00033     QT_CONNECT(m_next_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(display_next_verse()));
00034     QT_CONNECT(m_prev_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(display_prev_verse()));
00035     QT_CONNECT(m_star_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(change_star_button_icon()));
00036     QT_CONNECT(m_star_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(change_starred_verse_state()));
00037 
00038     m_star_button->setEnabled(false);
00039     m_star_button->setIcon(QIcon(QString(":/icons/star_off.png")));
00040     m_star_button->setToolTip(tr("Save this verse"));
00041     m_star_button->setCheckable(true);
00042 
00043     m_more_button->setEnabled(false);
00044     m_more_button->setIcon(QIcon(QString(":/icons/plus.png")));
00045     m_more_button->setToolTip(tr("Show more context"));
00046     
00047     m_less_button->setEnabled(false);
00048     m_less_button->setIcon(QIcon(QString(":/icons/minus.png")));
00049     m_less_button->setToolTip(tr("Show less context"));
00050 
00051     m_next_button->setEnabled(false);
00052     m_next_button->setIcon(QIcon(QString(":/icons/next.png")));
00053     m_next_button->setToolTip(tr("Next verse"));
00054 
00055     m_prev_button->setEnabled(false);
00056     m_prev_button->setIcon(QIcon(QString(":/icons/prev.png")));
00057     m_prev_button->setToolTip(tr("Previous verse"));
00058 
00059     QHBoxLayout* header_row = new QHBoxLayout;
00060 
00061     header_row->addWidget(m_title);
00062     header_row->addWidget(m_star_button);
00063     header_row->addWidget(m_less_button);
00064     header_row->addWidget(m_more_button);
00065     header_row->addWidget(m_prev_button);
00066     header_row->addWidget(m_next_button);
00067 
00068     m_text->setReadOnly(true);
00069 
00070     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout;
00071 
00072     layout->addLayout(header_row);
00073     layout->addWidget(m_text);
00074 
00075     setLayout(layout);
00076 }

00078 void UITextViewWidget::display_text(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay> verse)
00079 {
00080     m_displayed_verse = verse;
00081 
00082     boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(verse->get_translation());
00083 
00084     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> > verses = translation->get_verse(m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id(),
00085                                                                                  m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context());
00086     m_title->setText(verse_collection_title(verses, translation).c_str());
00087     m_text->setText(verse_collection_to_string(verses).c_str());
00088 
00089     m_star_button->setChecked(m_starred_verses_model->verse_starred(m_displayed_verse));
00090 
00091     change_star_button_icon();
00092 
00093     m_star_button->setEnabled(star_button_should_be_enabled());
00094     m_more_button->setEnabled(more_button_should_be_enabled());
00095     m_less_button->setEnabled(less_button_should_be_enabled());
00096     m_next_button->setEnabled(next_button_should_be_enabled());
00097     m_prev_button->setEnabled(prev_button_should_be_enabled());
00098 }
00099 
00100 void UITextViewWidget::increase_displayed_context()
00101 {
00102     m_displayed_verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_displayed_verse->get_translation(), m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id(), 
00103                                                                          m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context() + 1));
00104     
00105     display_text(m_displayed_verse);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void UITextViewWidget::decrease_displayed_context()
00109 {
00110     int requested_displayed_context = m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context() - 1;
00111     
00112     if (requested_displayed_context >= 0)
00113     {
00114         m_displayed_verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_displayed_verse->get_translation(), m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id(), 
00115                                                                              requested_displayed_context));
00116         display_text(m_displayed_verse);
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void UITextViewWidget::display_next_verse()
00121 {
00122     int requested_next_verse = m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() + 1;
00123 
00124     boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_displayed_verse->get_translation());
00125     if (requested_next_verse < translation->num_entries())
00126     {
00127         m_displayed_verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_displayed_verse->get_translation(), m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() +1, 
00128                                                                              m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context()));
00129         display_text(m_displayed_verse);
00130         
00131         if (!next_button_should_be_enabled() && m_next_button->isEnabled())
00132             m_next_button->setEnabled(false);
00133 
00134         if (!m_prev_button->isEnabled())
00135             m_prev_button->setEnabled(true);
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00139 void UITextViewWidget::display_prev_verse()
00140 {
00141     int requested_next_verse = m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() - 1;
00142 
00143     if (requested_next_verse >= 0)
00144     {
00145         m_displayed_verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_displayed_verse->get_translation(), m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() - 1, 
00146                                                                              m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context()));
00147         display_text(m_displayed_verse);
00148 
00149         if (!prev_button_should_be_enabled() && m_prev_button->isEnabled())
00150             m_prev_button->setEnabled(false);
00151         
00152         if (!m_next_button->isEnabled())
00153             m_next_button->setEnabled(true);
00154     }
00155 }
00156 
00157 void UITextViewWidget::change_star_button_icon()
00158 {
00159     if (m_star_button->isChecked())
00160         m_star_button->setIcon(QIcon(QString(":/icons/star_on.png")));
00161     else
00162         m_star_button->setIcon(QIcon(QString(":/icons/star_off.png")));
00163 }
00164 
00165 void UITextViewWidget::change_starred_verse_state()
00166 {
00167     if (m_star_button->isChecked())
00168         emit verse_starred(m_displayed_verse);
00169     else
00170         emit verse_unstarred(m_displayed_verse);
00171 }
00172 
00173 bool UITextViewWidget::prev_button_should_be_enabled()
00174 {
00175     return m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() > 0;
00176 }
00177 
00178 bool UITextViewWidget::next_button_should_be_enabled()
00179 {
00180     boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_displayed_verse->get_translation());
00181     return m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() != translation->num_entries()-1;
00182 }
00183 
00184 bool UITextViewWidget::more_button_should_be_enabled()
00185 {
00186     return m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() != -1;
00187 }
00188 
00189 bool UITextViewWidget::less_button_should_be_enabled()
00190 {
00191     return m_displayed_verse->get_num_verses_context() > 0;
00192 }
00193 
00194 bool UITextViewWidget::star_button_should_be_enabled()
00195 {
00196     return m_displayed_verse->get_verse_id() != -1;
00197 }
